Package cz.cuni.mff.java.flightplanner.util

Class Utilities

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.java.flightplanner.util.Utilities
public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
The class which provides different useful methods used in the different parts of the program. These methods may be almost always called as they are, as they only provide certain type of functionality, conversion etc...

  • Method Details

    • isBetween

      static boolean isBetween​(int number, int lowerBound, int upperBound)
      Parameters:
      number - target number
      lowerBound - the lower bound of the interval
      upperBound - the upper bound of the interval
      Returns:
      the indication of whether the number is in the range between lowerBound and upperBound

    • conversion

      public static java.lang.String conversion​(boolean conversionNeeded, java.lang.String valueToConvert, double constant, java.lang.String finalUnit)
      Parameters:
      conversionNeeded - The flag indicating whether the conversion should be actually performed. The conversion can be explicitely defined as true, or expressed by any boolean condition.
      valueToConvert - The String value to be converted.This value is parsed to the double value in the unitsConverter(String, double) method.
      constant - The constant used for the conversion of the valueToConvert parameter.
      finalUnit - Optional argument specifying the unit for the result.
      Returns:
      The String representing result of the conversion of the valueToConvert parameter multiplied by the constant.

    • unitsConverter

      public static double unitsConverter​(double arg, double constant)
      Fixed multiplication converter. Converts a value based on the constant.
      Parameters:
      arg - The value to be converted.
      constant - The constant multiplied to the arg
      Returns:
      Returns the arg parameter value after conversion.

    • unitsConverter

      static java.lang.String unitsConverter​(java.lang.String arg, double constant)
      An alternative for unitsConverter(double, double) method. Casts the arg String to double value and converts it using the method mentioned in the link.
      Parameters:
      arg - Argument to be parsed and converted.
      constant - The constant multiplied to the arg
      Returns:
      The arg value converted to another units using the constant.
      See Also:
      unitsConverter(double, double)

    • parseDouble

      public static double parseDouble​(java.lang.String strNum)
      Parses the String parameter supposed to be double number.
      Parameters:
      strNum - The string to be parsed.
      Returns:
      Double number value of strNum parameter or NaN if something goes wrong.

    • sectionSeparator

      public static java.lang.String sectionSeparator​(java.lang.String sectionName)
      The method provides the separator for different sections of the output text.
      Parameters:
      sectionName - The argument to be put between the separator.
      Returns:
      The separator String.
